translations: 损耗，洗手间（loo 复数形式）
（Loos）人名；（法、德、西、捷、瑞典）洛斯；（英）卢斯

sentences.sentence: Anita Loos was in many respects untypical of the screenwriting trade.
sentences.translation: 从很多方面来看，安妮塔•卢斯都不能算是编剧界的代表性人物。

sentences.sentence: Unfortunately, says Loos, much of it is out of your control - it's largely genetic and gender based.
sentences.translation: 很不幸，鲁斯说，脂肪会被存放到何处基本是不可控的——这大部分取决于你的基因和性别。

sentences.sentence: Put bricks in all the loos to reduce water. Carefully recycle all waste, compost all organic matter 0.1.
sentences.translation: 在所有厕所水箱里放置砖块以减少冲厕用水。
